A story of a tree that holds onto its leaves throughout the year, defying the natural cycle of shedding and growth.
A character who is emotionally detached and struggles to let go of the past, similar to the tree that clings to its leaves.
A metaphor for a person who is unable to adapt to change and remains stuck in theiries.
A symbol of resilience and strength, as the tree that never falls is able to withstand any storm or obstacle.
A representation of a person who is afraid of change and loss, and holds onto the past in an attempt to preserve their memories.
